title: Find Arabella's Parents
content:
e Ring.

How to unlock Find Arabella's Parents

Speak to Arabella in Reithwin Town. You can find her on the north side of town between the Mason's Guild and the House of Healing, just outside the gates to the cemetery. There will be two winged lion statues, one of them fallen.

Find Arabella's Parents Rewards

Shadow Blade Ring

Find Arabella's Parents Notes & Tips

Notes & tips go here

All Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 Acquire the Gauntlets for Helsik ♦ Aid the Underduke ♦ Ask the Goblin Priestess
